alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; East Central Plains; Northeast Plains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 13 at 1:59PM MDT until April 13 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM THIS EVENING FOR MUCH OF EASTERN NEW MEXICO AS WELL AS THE SOUTHWEST MOUNTAINS AND MIDDLE RIO GRANDE VALLEY DUE TO STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY AND AN UNSTABLE ATMOSPHERE... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT FRIDAY FOR MUCH OF EASTERN NEW MEXICO DUE TO STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY AND AN UNSTABLE ATMOSPHERE... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING FOR THE MIDDLE RIO GRANDE VALLEY DUE TO STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY AND AN UNSTABLE ATMOSPHERE... .Winds will remain strong this afternoon, and combine with low humidity, near to above normal temperatures and an unstable atmosphere to produce critical fire weather conditions over much of southwestern, central and eastern New Mexico. Critical fire weather conditions will likely return on Friday across eastern and portions of central New Mexico as well. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT FRIDAY... The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a Red Flag Warning...which is in effect from noon to 8 PM MDT Friday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AREA AND TIMING...Northeast Plains (Zone 104), Central Highlands (Zone 125) and East Central Plains (Zone 126) until 8 pm MDT this evening and again from noon to 8 pm MDT Friday. * 20 FOOT WINDS...Southwest 20 to 25 mph with gusts to around 35 mph this afternoon and evening. West 20 to 30 mph with gusts near 40 mph on Friday. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Ranging from near 7 to 15 percent this afternoon and 10 to 15 percent Friday. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning and Fire Weather Watch.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; East Central Plains; Northeast Plains
